import React,{useState,useEffect,useCallback}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/patientTemplates.css';import{FaCheckCircle,FaRegCircle,FaFileDownload}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function PatientTemplatesPage(){const[templates,setTemplates]=useState([]);const[filter,setFilter]=useState('All');const[search,setSearch]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const headers={'Content-Type':'application/json','x-auth-token':token};// Carga inicial de plantillas asignadas
useEffect(()=>{if(!token)return navigate('/login');fetch('/api/patient/templates',{headers}).then(res=>{if(res.status===401)throw new Error('Sesión expirada');if(!res.ok)throw new Error(`Error ${res.status}`);return res.json();}).then(data=>{// Ordenar por fecha de asignación descendente
const sorted=data.sort((a,b)=>new Date(b.assignedAt)-new Date(a.assignedAt));setTemplates(sorted);}).catch(err=>setError(err.message)).finally(()=>setLoading(false));},[navigate,token]);// Toggle de completado de actividad
